tokens.text: validates item type definitions and format versions

title: Item Types
description: Validates behavior pack item type definitions including format versions, identifiers, and metadata. Can automatically update format versions to the latest.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the item type (e.g., mypack:custom_sword). Should follow namespace:name format.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the item type identifier

fields.title: Metadata
fields.description: Additional metadata associated with the item type definition.

fields.title: Category
fields.description: The category of the item type (equipment, items, nature, etc.) for creative inventory placement.

fields.title: Version Defined
fields.description: Confirms that a format_version field is defined in the item type JSON. Required for proper parsing.

fields.title: Major Version Low
fields.description: Warning when the item's format_version major number is below the current version. Consider updating to access new features.

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack item type format version to latest version.

fields.title: Major Version High
fields.description: Error when the item's format_version major number is above the current version. The item may not load correctly.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the format_version exceeding current

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack item type format version to latest version.

fields.title: Minor Version Low
fields.description: Warning when the item's format_version minor number is below the current version.

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack item type format version to latest version.

fields.title: Minor Version High
fields.description: Error when the item's format_version minor number is above the current version.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the format_version exceeding current

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack item type format version to latest version.

fields.title: Patch Version Low
fields.description: Information when the item's format_version patch number is below the current version.

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack item type format version to latest version.

fields.title: Patch Version High
fields.description: Warning when the item's format_version patch number is above the current version.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the format_version exceeding current

matchedValues.action: Set behavior pack item type format version to latest version.

fields.title: Version Fetch Error
fields.description: Error when the current Minecraft version could not be determined for comparison.

fields.title: Version Parse Error
fields.description: Error when the Minecraft version string could not be parsed into version numbers.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the unparseable version string
